nickname.description: A short phrase used to identify the plan.

tiers.description: Details of the pricing tiers if the plan uses tiered pricing.

aggregate_usage.description: Determines how usage is calculated for the subscription.

created.description: Timestamp representing the creation date of the plan.

updated.description: Timestamp representing the last update of the plan.

statement_description.description: Description to be shown on customer statements.

product.description: The product associated with the plan.

statement_descriptor.description: The statement descriptor to be shown on credit card statements.

interval_count.description: Number of intervals between each subscription billing.

transform_usage.description: Specifies billing behavior for subscription within a few hours of cycle-end.

amount.description: The amount in the smallest currency unit representing the price of the plan.

interval.description: Specifies the duration between billing periods.

trial_period_days.description: Number of days in the trial period for new subscribers.

usage_type.description: Specifies metered billing or licensed billing.

active.description: Indicates if the plan is currently active or not.

tiers_mode.description: Determines how to interpret the pricing tiers.

billing_scheme.description: Specifies how the subscription interacts with proration.

livemode.description: Indicates if the plan is in livemode or testmode.

currency.description: The currency in which the plan amount is specified.

metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs associated with the plan.

amount_decimal.description: The decimal equivalent of the amount field.

is_deleted.description: Indicates if the plan has been marked as deleted.
